columns.name: license
columns.title: License
columns.description: The Public Chauffeur license number issued to the licensee.

columns.name: renewed
columns.title: Renewal Date
columns.description: The date (month/year) the license was last renewed.

columns.name: status
columns.title: Status
columns.description: The current status of the license (Active, Hold, Suspended, Denied, Revoked, Inactive).

columns.name: status_date
columns.title: Status Date
columns.description: The date the license was last updated.

columns.name: driver_type
columns.title: Driver Type
columns.description: The type of public passenger vehicle the licensee is authorized to operate (Taxi, Livery Only, or Horse-Drawn Only).

columns.name: license_type
columns.title: License Type
columns.description: The license term issued to the licensee (Permanent with a one-year term or Temporary with a defined term less than one year).

columns.name: issue_date
columns.title: Original Issue Date
columns.description: The date the licensee was issued his/her first Public Chauffeur license under the indicated license number.

columns.name: name
columns.title: Name
columns.description: The name of the person issued the Public Chauffeur license.
